overview: Joel is away at university just getting ready for midterms when he gets a surprise visit from his old partner in crime, Lana. This of course can mean nothing but trouble for Joel. Before you can say "I just failed Algebra," Lana and Joel are back in business, and the news is spreading fast. The whole campus wants what Joel is selling, and are willing to pay for it, big time. Lana and her girls are more than happy to give the student body a taste of their "private tutoring" sessions.
tagline: Sometimes you just gotta say, WTF? (Want To Fuck?)
title: Unfinished Business
